oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Tom T. Hall's Songs of Fox Hollow - 2011-07-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance - Tom T. Hall's Songs of Fox Hollow - 2011-07-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tom T. Hall; Peter Cooper; Eric Brace; Patty Griffin; Buddy Miller; Bobby Bare; Jim Lauderdale; Adam Wright; Shannon Wright; Gary Bennett; Mark Horn; Mike Granda; Jon Byrd; Tommy Cash; Fayssous Starling McLean;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Concert performance celebrating the audio CD release of "I Love: Tom T. Hall's Songs of Fox Hollow. Includes audio from video and interview with Tom T. Hall and Dixie Hall. Performances include; I Love (Patty Griffin): Sneaky Snake (Buddy Miller); Everybody Loves To Hear A Bird Sing (Peter Cooper); I Care (Bobby Bare); I Like To Feel Pretty Inside (Jim Lauderdale); The Mystery Fox Of Fox Hollow (Eric Brace); I Wish I Had A Million Friends (Adam and Shannon Wright); The Barn Dance (Gary Bennett); The Song Of The One-Legged Chicken (Mark and Mike aka Mark Horn & Mike "Supe" Granda); How To Talk To A Little Baby Goat (Jon Byrd); Ole Lonesome George The Basset (Tommy Cash); Tom T. Hall tells story about the next song; I Made A Friend Of A Flower Today (Fayssoux Starling McLean and Tom T. Hall); I Love (Tom T. Hall);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hall, Tom T.; Cooper, Peter; Brace, Eric; Griffin, Patty; Miller, Buddy; Bare, Bobby; Lauderdale, Jim; Wright, Adam; Wright, Shannon; Bennett, Gary; Horn, Mike; Granda, Mark; Byrd, Jon; Cash, Tommy; McLean, Fayssous Starlng; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
